body: Ethereum is proposed by Vitalik Buterin and crowdfunded through a public crowdsale.
The Ethereum network experiences a surge in usage due to the popularity of initial coin offerings (ICOs), leading to congestion on the network and high transaction fees.
The Ethereum Foundation announces its plans to transition the network from a Proof of Work (PoW) to a Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, which is more energy-efficient.

The Ethereum network continues to experience high usage and congestion, leading to record-high transaction fees. The Ethereum community implements EIP-1559 to improve the predictability of transaction fees.
